issue.title: [Window] Error when install ign-math on Window10

content.raw:
I’m also trying to install Gazebo for Windows and I have a related problem. I fixed your initial problem by adding the `ign-cmake/build` folder to my cmake environment variables. \(Also, make sure to `nmake`& `nmake install` ign-cmake after running its configuration file.\)

Now I’m getting a different error:

`CMake Error at C:/opt/gz-ws/ign-cmake/build/ignition-cmake2-config.cmake:78 (include):`  
`include could not find load file:`

`IgnCMake`

‌
